desc_e: Hong Kong Monthly Digest of Statistics

desc_c: 表11.1：留院及門診服務 － (甲) 衞生署
desc_e: Table 11.1 : Inpatient and outpatient services - (A) Department of Health

desc_c: 衞生署轄下的門診就診人次
desc_e: Outpatient attendances under Department of Health

desc_c: (註釋 1) 數字包括公務員診所、家庭醫學深造培訓中心及懲教機構內由衞生署提供服務的醫院。
desc_e: (note 1) Figures include families clinics, Education and Training Centre in Family Medicine and hospitals in correctional institutions with services provided by the Department of Health.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 2017年以前的數字只包括醫生診視、注射、敷藥及急症的人次。由2017年起，數字亦包括了戒煙服務、臨床心理學家診視及營養師診視的人次。由2019年6月起，數字亦包括了視光師診視及物理治療師診視的人次。
desc_e: (note 2) Before 2017, figures include doctor consultations, injections, dressings and accident and emergency only.  As from 2017, figures also include smoking cessation, clinical psychologist consultations and dietitian consultations.  As from June 2019, figures also include optometrist consultations and physiotherapist consultations.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 由於學生健康服務及學童牙科保健服務的每年數字是指該學年內的到診／到訪人次，所以按季數字的總和不等於按年數字。
desc_e: (note 3) Quarterly figures do not add up to annual figures as the annual attendances of the Student Health Service and School Dental Care Service are reported on school year basis.

desc_c: 表11.1：留院及門診服務 － (乙) 醫院管理局
desc_e: Table 11.1 : Inpatient and outpatient services - (B) Hospital Authority

desc_c: 醫院管理局轄下的住院病人及日間住院病人 (註釋 1) 出院人次及死亡人數
desc_e: Inpatient and day inpatient (note 1) discharges and deaths under Hospital Authority

desc_c: 醫院管理局轄下的住院病人 (註釋 2) 病床住用率 [百分比]
desc_e: Inpatient (note 2) bed occupancy rate under Hospital Authority [%]

desc_c: 醫院管理局轄下的門診就診人次
醫院管理局轄下的急症室就診人次 (註釋 6)
desc_e: Accident and emergency attendances under Hospital Authority (note 6)

desc_c: (註釋 1) 就醫管局而言，日間住院病人指入院接受非緊急治療並在同日出院的病人，住院病人則指經急症室轉介入院或留院超過一日的病人。
desc_e: (note 1) In Hospital Authority, day inpatients refer to those who are admitted into hospitals for non-emergency treatment and who are discharged within the same day.  Inpatients are those who are admitted into hospitals via Accident & Emergency Department or those who have stayed for more than one day.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 計算住院病床佔用率不包括日間住院病人。
desc_e: (note 2) The calculation of inpatient bed occupancy rate does not include day inpatients.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 普通科門診就診人次包括由醫生診視的就診人次、普通科護士診所的就診人次及醫療改革服務計劃內的基層醫療服務就診人次。
desc_e: (note 3) General outpatient (GOP) attendances include attendances for doctor consultations, attendances from nurse clinic in GOP setting and attendances in related healthcare reform initiative programmes in primary care.

desc_c: (註釋 4) 專科門診（臨床）就診人次也包括專科護士診所的就診人次。
desc_e: (note 4) Specialist outpatient (SOP) (clinical) attendances also include attendances from nurse clinic in SOP setting.

desc_c: (註釋 5) 專職醫療（門診）就診人次不包括由醫務社會服務部提供的跟進個案。
desc_e: (note 5) Allied Health (outpatient) attendances exclude follow-up consultations provided by the Medical Social Services Units.

desc_c: (註釋 6) 就診人次包括首次及覆診個案。
desc_e: (note 6) Attendances figures include first and follow-up cases.

desc_c: 已呈報的傳染病受影響人數
desc_e: Persons affected by notified infectious diseases

desc_c: 已呈報的傳染病死亡人數
社區型耐甲氧西林金黃葡萄球菌感染
乙型流感嗜血桿菌感染 (侵入性)
腦膜炎雙球菌感染 (侵入性)
風疹(德國麻疹)及先天性風疹綜合症
產志賀毒素大腸桿菌感染
斑疹傷寒及其他立克次體病
已呈報的傳染病宗數為衞生署截至2020年6月10日所知悉的個案數目。最新數字詳載於衞生防護中心網站 (www.chp.gov.hk)。
desc_e: Number of notified cases refers to notifications of infectious disease cases known to the Department of Health as of 10 June 2020.  Up-to-date figures are available at the website of the Centre for Health Protection (www.chp.gov.hk).

desc_c: 在上述時期內，並沒有接獲呈報急性脊髓灰質炎（小兒麻痺）、炭疽、白喉、中東呼吸綜合症、鼠疫、狂犬病、回歸熱、嚴重急性呼吸系統綜合症、天花、病毒性出血熱、西尼羅河病毒感染或黃熱病的個案。
desc_e: No case of Acute poliomyelitis, Anthrax, Diphtheria, Middle East Respiratory Syndrome, Plague, Rabies, Relapsing fever, Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome, Smallpox, Viral haemorrhagic fever, West Nile Virus Infection or Yellow fever was reported during the specified periods.

desc_c: 死亡數字代表期內在入境事務處登記的死亡人數，而不依據個案呈報衞生署的日期。
desc_e: Number of deaths refers to deaths registered at the Immigration Department in the period, irrespective of the date of notification to the Department of Health.

desc_c: (註釋 1) 由2020年1月8日起，「嚴重新型傳染性病原體呼吸系統病」列為須呈報的傳染病。 而由4月29日起，「嚴重新型傳染性病原體呼吸系統病」已易名為「2019冠狀病毒病」。
desc_e: (note 1) “Severe Respiratory Disease associated with a Novel Infectious Agent” has been listed as a notifiable infectious disease since 8 January 2020 and renamed as “Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)” since 29 April 2020.
Centre for Health Protection, Department of Health

desc_c: 表11.3：綜合社會保障援助計劃
desc_e: Table 11.3 : Comprehensive Social Security Assistance Scheme

desc_c: 綜合社會保障援助計劃的個案數目 (註釋 1)
desc_e: Number of cases of Comprehensive Social Security Assistance Scheme (note 1)

desc_c: 綜合社會保障援助計劃的發放款項 [百萬元]
desc_e: Amount of payment of Comprehensive Social Security Assistance Scheme [$ million]

desc_c: 綜合社會保障援助計劃的申請個案數目
desc_e: Number of applications of Comprehensive Social Security Assistance Scheme

desc_c: 綜合社會保障援助計劃個案類別
desc_e: Type of Comprehensive Social Security Assistance Scheme cases
(note 1) Figures are as at the end of the period.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 財政年度由4月1日至3月31日。
desc_e: (note 2) Financial year runs from 1 April to 31 March.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 包括於該財政年度向綜援個案額外發放的一個月標準金額。
desc_e: (note 3) Including the payment of one additional month of standard rates to the Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) cases for the respective financial years.

desc_c: (註釋 4) 包括於該財政年度向綜援個案額外發放的兩個月標準金額，以及根據關愛共享計劃發放款項以補不足4,000元的差額。
desc_e: (note 4) Including the payment of two additional months of standard rates and the top-up payment to make up to $4,000 under the Caring and Sharing Scheme to the CSSA cases for the respective financial years.

desc_c: (註釋 5) 大部分在2018/19學年向每名有經濟需要學生一次過發放2,000元的津貼已於2018年8月發放。
desc_e: (note 5) The majority of the one-off grant of $2,000 to each needy student in 2018/19 school year was made in August 2018.

desc_c: (註釋 6) 大部分於2019-20年度向綜援個案額外發放的一個月標準金額已於2019年6月發放。
desc_e: (note 6) The majority of the payment of one additional month of standard rates to the CSSA cases for 2019-20 was made in June 2019.

desc_c: (註釋 7) 大部分在2019/20學年向每名有經濟需要學生一次過發放2,500元的津貼已於2019年8月發放。
desc_e: (note 7) The majority of the one-off grant of $2,500 to each needy student in 2019/20 school year was made in August 2019.

desc_c: (註釋 8) 大部分由財政司司長於2019年8月宣布向綜援個案額外發放的一個月標準金額已於2020年1月發放。
desc_e: (note 8) The majority of the payment of one additional month of standard rates to the CSSA cases announced by Financial Secretary in August 2019 was made in January 2020.

desc_c: (註釋 9) 大部分於2020-21年度向綜援個案額外發放的一個月標準金額已於2020年6月發放。
desc_e: (note 9) The majority of the payment of one additional month of standard rates to the CSSA cases for 2020-21 was made in June 2020.

desc_c: 公共福利金計劃的個案數目 (註釋 1)
desc_e: Number of cases of Social Security Allowance Scheme (note 1)

desc_c: 公共福利金計劃的發放款項 [百萬元]
desc_e: Amount of payment of Social Security Allowance Scheme [$ million]

desc_c: 公共福利金計劃的申請個案數目
desc_e: Number of applications of Social Security Allowance Scheme
(note 1) Figures are as at the end of the period.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 財政年度由4月1日至3月31日。
desc_e: (note 2) Financial year runs from 1 April to 31 March.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 福建計劃由2018年4月起實施。
desc_e: (note 3) The Fujian Scheme was launched in April 2018.

desc_c: (註釋 4) 包括於該財政年度向公共福利金個案額外發放的一個月福利金。
desc_e: (note 4) Including the payment of one additional month of allowances to the Social Security Allowance (SSA) cases for the respective financial years.

desc_c: (註釋 5) 包括於該財政年度向公共福利金個案額外發放的兩個月福利金，以及根據關愛共享計劃發放款項以補不足4,000元的差額。此外，亦包括向合資格的高額長者生活津貼受惠人補發由2017 年 5月開始的一筆過津貼。
desc_e: (note 5) Including the payment of two additional months of allowances and the top-up payment to make up to $4,000 under the Caring and Sharing Scheme to the SSA cases for the respective financial year.  Moreover, the disbursement of a one-off grant to eligible recipients of the Higher OALA, with retrospective effect from May 2017 was also included.

desc_c: (註釋 6) 大部分於2019-20年度向公共福利金個案額外發放的一個月福利金已於2019年6月發放。
desc_e: (note 6) The majority of the payment of one additional month of allowances to the SSA cases for 2019-20 was made in June 2019.

desc_c:
(註釋 7) 大部分由財政司司長於2019年8月宣布向公共福利
金個案額外發放的一個月福利金已於2020年1月發放。
desc_e: (note 7) The majority of the payment of one additional month of allowances to the SSA cases announced by Financial Secretary in August 2019 was made in January 2020.

desc_c: (註釋 8) 大部分於2020-21年度向公共福利金個案額外發放的一個月福利金已於2020年6月發放。
desc_e: (note 8) The majority of the payment of one additional month of allowances to the SSA cases for 2020-21 was made in June 2020.

非暴力罪案 - 非暴力罪案總計
由於某些案件在獲得進一步資料後被重新界定分類，季度數字的總和與年度總數未必相同。
desc_e: The sum of the quarterly figures may differ from the annual figures since cases may be reclassified upon receipt of further information.

desc_c: (註釋 1) 只包括向警方舉報的案件／被警方拘捕的人數。
desc_e: (note 1) Refer to cases reported to/persons arrested by Police only.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 數字包括所有廉政公署處理的可追查案件。
desc_e: (note 2) Figures include all the pursuable cases handled by the Independent Commission Against Corruption.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 由於單一貪污舉報可能包含多宗涉及不同政府部門／公共機構／行業的投訴，署方會以投訴數字取代舉報數字，從而更清晰地反映貪污情況。
desc_e: (note 3) The corruption complaint figures (instead of corruption report figures, as a corruption report may contain multiple complaints in respect of different government departments/public bodies/industries) are presented to reflect more clearly the corruption situation.

desc_c: (註釋 4) 上述數字為檢控數字。倘若同一名人士在不同案件被檢控，上述數字亦會按其被檢控的次數計算。
desc_e: (note 4) Figures refer to the number of prosecutions.  If a person is prosecuted in different cases, the figures will take into account the number of prosecutions made against that person.
Hong Kong Police Force; Independent Commission Against Corruption

desc_c: 表11.8：按地點劃分的主要文化場地使用率
desc_e: Table 11.8 : Usage rates of major cultural venues by location

desc_c: 主要文化場地使用率 [百分比]
desc_e: Usage rates of major cultural venues [Percentage]

desc_c: 因應2019冠狀病毒病疫情，康樂及文化事務署轄下所有表演場地於2020年1月29日至5月 31日關閉。香港太空館和香港科學館的演講廳及香港視覺藝術中心的展覽廳和陶瓷室亦於2020年1月29日起暫時關閉。
desc_e: Due to the epidemic of COVID-19, all performance venues under the management of the Leisure and Cultural Services Department were closed from 29 January to 31 May 2020.  Lecture Halls of the Hong Kong Space Museum and Hong Kong Science Museum, and the Exhibition Hall and Ceramic Studio of the Hong Kong Visual Arts Centre were also temporarily closed since 29 January 2020.

desc_c: 場地使用率是指設施使用總日數佔可供租用總日數（不包括維修日、場地因社會事件和疫情影響而暫停開放的日數）的百分比。
desc_e: Venue usage rates are based on the number of days used over the total number of days available, excluding maintenance and the closure of venues due to social events and the epidemic.

desc_c: (註釋 1) 香港體育館表演場於2019年12月1日至31日進行維修工程。
desc_e: (note 1) The Arena of Hong Kong Coliseum have arranged maintenance work from 1 to 31 December 2019.

desc_c:
(註釋 2) 以下表演場地曾於2020年5月有限度開放服務予場地伙伴、文化節目組及租用人製作網上節目或錄影拍攝：
香港大會堂劇院（2日）
香港文化中心音樂廳（4日）及劇場（7日）
香港體育館表演場（1日）
屯門大會堂文娛廳（4日）
葵青劇院演藝廳（4日）
desc_e:
(note 2) The following venues have been opened with limited-scale services for venue partners, Cultural Presentations Section and hirer for the production of online programmes or video shooting in May 2020:  
Hong Kong City Hall Theatre (2 days)
Hong Kong Cultural Centre Concert Hall (4 days) and Studio Theatre (7 days)
Hong Kong Coliseum Arena (1 day)
Tuen Mun Town Hall Cultural Activities Hall (4 days)
Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium (4 days)

desc_c: (註釋 3) 因天花工程關係，香港視覺藝術中心展覽廳於2019年5月28日至7月22日暫時關閉。
desc_e: (note 3) The Exhibition Hall of the Hong Kong Visual Arts Centre was temporarily closed from 28 May to 22 July 2019 for the renovation of ceiling.

desc_c: (註釋 4) 香港視覺藝術中心陶瓷室於2020年3月11日至22日期間開放以提供有限度的服務。
desc_e: (note 4) The Ceramic Studio of the Hong Kong Visual Arts Centre was opened for limited-scale services during the period from 11 to 22 March 2020.

desc_c: (註釋 5) 香港科學館演講廳於2020年5月25日至8月31日關閉以進行翻新工程。
desc_e: (note 5) The Lecture Hall of the Hong Kong Science Museum is closed for renovation from 25 May to 31 Aug 2020.

desc_c: (註釋 6) 香港視覺藝術中心陶瓷室自2020年5月6日開放以提供有限度的服務。
desc_e: (note 6) The Ceramic Studio of the Hong Kong Visual Arts Centre was opened for limited-scale services from 6 May 2020 onwards.

desc_c: (註釋 7) 上環文娛中心劇院、西灣河文娛中心劇院、荃灣大會堂演奏廳和文娛廳及葵青劇院演藝廳於2020年6月關閉以進行維修工程。
desc_e: (note 7) The Theatre of Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre of Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Auditorium and Cultural Activities Hall of Tsuen Wan Town Hall and Auditorium of Kwai Tsing Theatre were closed in June 2020 for maintenance.

(註釋 1) 就每個體育館類別而定，一個主場通常可當作四個羽毛球場、一個籃球場或一個排球場使用。除主場外，其他設施有舞蹈室、健身室、遊戲室或乒乓球室等。
desc_e: (note 1) Depending on the type of each sports centre, one arena normally can be used as four badminton courts, one basketball court or one volleyball court.  Facilities also include dance room, fitness room, games room, or table tennis room, etc.

desc_c: 高於100%的數字表示場地實際使用人數超過其可容納人數。
desc_e: Figures more than 100% denote actual utilisation exceeding capacity.

(註釋 1) 「大火」指發生三級及以上火警。
desc_e: (note 1) "Major fire" refers to fire incidents of No. 3 Alarm and above.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 「一般火警」指發生一級及二級火警。
desc_e: (note 2) "General fire" refers to fire incidents of No.1 and No.2 Alarm.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 數字包括交通意外、船舶失事、有人被困升降機內或被鎖室內、氣體洩漏、樓房倒塌、水浸、山泥傾瀉、工業意外和有人企圖從高處跳下的召喚等。
desc_e: (note 3) Figures include calls of traffic accidents, shipwrecks, people trapped/shut in lift or locked in rooms, gas leakages, house collapses, flooding, landslides, industrial accidents and attempts by people to jump from heights, etc.
